attributes.action: MAKE THE RELIVENT COURSES AVAILABLE TO IPP PRISONERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
IPP PRISONER ALL 3000 PLUS CAN NOT PROVE THEY ARE WORTHY OF PAROLE AS THE COURSES THE NEED TO DO ARE NOT AVAILABLE IN THE PRISONS OUT OF THE 3000 PLUS ONLY ABOUT 5 MAVE MANAGED PAROLE.
THIS IS WHY THERE IS SO MUCH OVER CROWDING ONE EXSAMPLE SCOTT TILLOTT WAS SENT TO FOREST BANK FOR 2 YEARS FOR STEELING A HANDBAG CONTAINING £20.
AS THE COURSES ARE NOT AVAILABLE AT FOREST BANK HE HAS NOW SERVED 3 YEARS AND STILL CANT HAVE PAROLE AS NOT   DONE COURSES AND CANT BE MOVED BECAUSE HE IS ON A PAROLE BLOCK CATCH 22 CANT DO COURSES AND CANT BE MOVED

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
